channel.title: Help with server!
channel.description:
hi i want to change my starter area like where new people log in and they start in that area where you want it to be so can someone help me plz.
thankz.

item.title: Help with server!
item.dc:creator: @marcman906 marcman906
item.description:
@marcman906 wrote:

SirPali:

PS: Use ::mypos the find the coordinates of the location you are currently standing.

PSS - If you don’t have a ::mypos command open up client.java and search for

sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+"");

…and if it finds nothing add this code (Deltascape)

} if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 2){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server!
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Open up your client.java, and search for the X Coordinate of your current starting place.
Below it should also be the Y coordinate, change these 2 coordinates to your desired location, save and compile.

PS: Use ::mypos the find the coordinates of the location you are currently standing.

Read full topic
